dmca.title: Kundera finds unauthorized translation unbearable
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

let us contact you on behalf of our client, Milan Kundera. We are a Czech agency representing authors of literary, theatre and audio-visual works and also a collective management organisation, member of CISAC and GESAC. As you surely know, Milan Kundera is a famous czech writer, who lives in France, Milan Kundera is the author of a novel called
